title: Created equal
creator_credit: Video Arts, Michael Latham and Graham Massey
brief_description: Milton Friedman discusses freedom and equality, arguing that a society which maximises the scope for individual choice and action will be more successful at creating equal opportunities for all than a society which seeks to achieve quality through distribution of wealth.
creator_credit_for_label: Video Arts, Michael Latham and Graham Massey
